pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, April 13, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, April 13, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Crown-Métis Nation Summit.

Sir John A. MacDonald Building
144 Wellington Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open photo opportunity for remarks at beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:45 a.m. and present themselves to room 201
  • Accreditation from the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery is required. For more information, contact Marc Fortier at marc.fortier@parl.gc.ca

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Nobel Peace Prize Laureate Leymah Gbowee.

Prime Minister’s Office
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open photo opportunity
  • Accreditation from the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery required. For more information, contact Marc Fortier at marc.fortier@parl.gc.ca
